TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content: Valve need to introduce that core into the next portal game or expansion, I wouldn't care if it was the enemy, I would go straight to it for a hug. Perfect trap.
yeah chell: aww i just want to hug i... KABOOM
The new Portal meme, the cat is a lie.
Cat core should be a reprogrammed space core that is obsessed with acting catlike.
Do you want to drive us all insane? Let's just turn him into a cat and be done with it.
Fine. I am a cat now. Not a cat core.
Wheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee cats!
Space core. For going to space. Get pulled over by space cops. Space cops take space core to space court. Sun is presiding in space court. Space core gets sent to space jail. For being in space.
So I just tried to land a re-creation of the Russian moonshot with BobCat's Soyuz and LK Lander... I missed the moon, ran out of fuel, but landed safely on Minmus.........WHAT.
leaving this here
Is it me or does that cat look psychotic, the type that, when you turn your back, would disappear and then kill you.

Is it me or does that cat look psychotic, the type that, when you turn your back, would disappear and then kill you.

Oh you mean me? *Sharpens a Gunto and smiles innocently* I prefer Grumpy Cat GRUMPY, not some cheaply photoshopped Happy Cat

I thought you prefer Blunt weapons? Like this or this.

Also, please don't use a sack and shovel on me.

I thought you prefer Blunt weapons?

I prefer them yes, but nothing beats an occasional slash-n'-stab... followed by a stash-n'-slab
Stash-n'-slab? Stash my inner organs but slab?

Internal organ rearrangement is always in order.

They can sometimes reattach severed limbs, but they end up completely numb cause they can't reconnect the neurons.
You wouldn't be able to find all the bits, I'll become little diced cubes of meat and bone.
then they could mince you into your contituant atoms and reconstruct you but then you would be dead so it would be a different person
No thank you, I like to keep my personality the same. I need it for KSP.
great idea well put you conciousness into the body of a kerbal
Can I take over the body of Jeb? Or at least go on mission with him?
You are not worthy peasant

Leopards have been reported roaming my base, screaming "ALL YOUR BASE ARE BELONG TO US" at the top of their lungs.

Also, you have lost The Game.
Thinking about what?
